= Overview =

The Notification Component provides a low coupling medium for the the controller layer to pass information to the user interface. It also allow the lower facade layer to pass information to the Main Core layer.

= Classes =

The main important class for Notification is the *NotificationQueue* and *INotificationQueue*. 

= Description of Design =

The notification layer follows a combination of Message Bus Design Pattern and Producer/Consumer. Both UI and SystemLogicLayer will have a notification watcher which will watch for notification. 

= Extending Notification =

To extend more notification, developer will have to add more enum to *NotificationCode* and extend from the *AbstractNotification* object.
